description: IMPROVING THE ADMINISTRATIVE AND ECONOMIC ENVIRONMENT FOR PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT BY FACILITATING PUBLIC-PRIVATE DIALOGUE

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: Effective public-private partnerships in identifying and removing barriers and challenges to small business development promoted; the expertise of the business community  strengthened to broaden its options for participation in the policy and rule-making process. The tools for comprehensive and consistent monitoring of trends in the small business sector developed. The role of the business community in creating a more favorable business environment strengthed.
subproject.title: PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT

title: PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT
